game.name: Box Breaker
game.description:
A unique type of arcade fun challenge has come to you today! We are damn sure that you would not get bored for a single minute if you dive into this brand new puzzle game. Are you ready to beat your boredom? Join Box Breaker and be prepared to destroy all boxes and enjoy in the most challenging environment! When you click the play button, you would see a ball that is ready to bounce on the board. Click the screen to begin your fun!

You have to move your board right or left to provide the needful support to the bouncing ball that will keep moving in the opposite direction. Apart from giving it the bouncing off, you also have to take care of when it changes the ability or power. Make sure your board would get touched with other certain objects.  Destroy all boxes and breakable objects to clear all 16 levels and become a champion of the boxer breaker!

Track your stage by looking at the top left corner of the screen and your score by keeping your eyes on the middle bottom of the screen! The colorful graphics supported by the easy controls and seamless gameplay will keep you glued to the screen for hours and hours. You can explore this highly addictive html5 platformer challenge in smartphones, desktops, tablets and iPads or iPhones. The best part is that our all games are free to play without download. So, you should not miss out this opportunity.

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Box Breaker at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: L-R ICON TO MOVE, DON'T LET THE BALL FALL
game.webControlKeys: L-R ARROWS TO MOVE, DON'T LET THE BALL FALL
